title: 01/14/22 DPs Best Of
itunes:title: 01/14/22 DPs Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to ESPN NFL analyst Marcus Spears. He thinks that we need to hold Aaron Rodgers more accountable if he's not able to get it done this year. Ross Tucker previews the Eagles chances against the Bucs this weekend and shares stories about peeing his pants during games. And Brian Griese tells us which he thinks the world will be talking about after Wild Card week in the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
